item.title: 利润增长，中国金风科技股价创四年来最大涨幅
item.description: 中国金风科技股份有限公司是全球最大的风力涡轮机制造商，由于强劲的国内需求推动了其利润增长，该公司股价创下四年来最大涨幅。【原文：China’s Goldwind Science & Technology Co., the world’s largest wind-turbine maker, saw shares jump the most in four years as strong domestic demand boosted its profits.】

item.title: 鸽派鲍威尔发出美联储降息信号后工业金属上涨
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）研讨会上发表讲话，表示央行可能在下个月降息，随后工业金属和铁矿石上涨。【原文：Industrial metals and iron ore rose after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s speech at the Jackson Hole symposium, where he signaled the central bank would likely cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 贝莱德暂停为最新亚洲私人信贷基金募资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，贝莱德公司今年早些时候暂停了其最新亚洲私人信贷策略的筹款活动，原因是该公司与 HPS Investment Partners 合并，这为该公司在该地区发展该资产类别的雄心增添了不确定性。【原文：BlackRock Inc. paused fundraising earlier this year for its latest Asian private credit strategy amid its merger with HPS Investment Partners, people familiar with the matter said, adding to uncertainties for the firm’s ambitions for the asset class in the region.】

item.title: 财政忧虑再现，印度债券涨势骤减
item.description: 两个月前，在印度的债券市场上很难发现熊市。现在，投资者的情绪发生了转变，他们要求更高的回报来持有印度的债券。【原文：Two months ago, it was hard to spot a bear in India’s bond market. Now, sentiment has flipped, with investors demanding higher returns to hold the nation’s debt.】

item.title: 东风汽车股价大涨 69%，因私有化和单位上市计划
item.description: 中国汽车制造商东风汽车集团股份有限公司（Dongfeng Motor Group Co.【原文：Dongfeng Motor Group Co.’s Hong Kong-listed shares surged the most in six months after the Chinese automaker announced long-awaited restructuring plans.】

item.title: 中国建筑商 Logan、KWG 吹响了 Corniche 贷款再融资的号角
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，陷入困境的中国开发商罗兰集团（Logan Group Co.【原文：Distressed Chinese developers Logan Group Co. and KWG Group Holdings Ltd. have been sounding out investor interest in a potential plan to refinance a $1.05 billion private loan secured by a luxury residential project in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西芒杜铁矿项目发生死亡事故后力拓停工
item.description: 力拓集团周日在一份声明中说，在一名工人在几内亚西芒杜铁矿石项目现场死亡后，力拓集团已停止该项目工作，但未详细说明事故原因或对矿山开发的任何影响。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has stopped work at its Simandou iron ore project in Guinea after a worker died at the site, it said in a statement on Sunday, without elaborating on the cause of the accident or on any impact on the mine’s development.】

item.title: 美国房市疲软令里斯股价创 1978 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: Reece Ltd.股价创下近五十年来最大跌幅，此前这家澳大利亚水暖用品公司报告全年利润下降，并警告称美国房地产市场持续疲软。【原文：Reece Ltd. shares plunged the most in almost five decades after the Australian plumbing supplies company reported a drop in full-year profit and warned of ongoing weakness in the US housing market.】

item.title: 新西兰零售额意外增长，显示经济复苏迹象
item.description: 新西兰第二季度的零售额出乎意料地增长，这表明较低的利率开始支持家庭支出并支撑经济复苏。【原文：New Zealand retail sales unexpectedly increased in the second quarter, suggesting that lower interest rates are starting to support household spending and underpin an economic recovery.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 即将收购呼叫中心软件制造商 Verint Systems
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Thoma Bravo 正接近达成收购呼叫中心软件制造商 Verint Systems Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Thoma Bravo is nearing a deal to acquire call center software maker Verint Systems Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市场锁定美联储 9 月降息，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）为 9 月份降息敞开大门之后，美国降息的势头日益高涨，黄金保持上涨。【原文：Gold held an advance as the momentum for US interest-rate cuts grew, after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell opened the door to a reduction in September.】

item.title: 中国下一个五年计划对煤炭退出至关重要：报告
item.description: 根据清洁能源倡导者的最新研究，尽管可再生能源蓬勃发展，气候保护期限也迅速临近，但中国仍然没有一个连贯的煤炭退出战略。【原文：Despite the boom in renewables and a fast-approaching climate deadline, China still doesn’t have a coherent exit strategy for coal, according to new research from clean energy advocates.】

item.title: 泰尔茂以 15 亿美元收购器官技术供应商 OrganOx
item.description: 泰尔茂公司已同意收购英国器官医疗技术公司 OrganOx Ltd.，交易价值约为 15 亿美元，旨在进军器官移植领域。【原文：Terumo Corp. has agreed to buy UK-based organ medical tech company OrganOx Ltd. in a deal valued at around $1.5 billion, seeking entry into the organ transplant field.】

item.title: 桑托斯上半年利润因能源价格下跌而下降
item.description: 由于液化天然气和石油价格下跌，桑托斯有限公司的收入在截至 6 月份的六个月里下降了五分之一以上。【原文：Santos Ltd.’s income fell by more than a fifth in the six months through June as liquefied natural gas and oil prices declined.】

item.title: 交易商关注供应和美联储的影响，石油保持升势
item.description: 由于交易商追踪供应紧张局势，以及美联储发出恢复降息信号后风险资产的广泛情绪，石油在一周上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a weekly gain as traders tracked tensions over supplies, as well as the wider mood for risk assets after the Federal Reserve signaled a return to interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 亚洲进入最繁忙的财报周，中国经济反弹初现雏形
item.description: 亚洲公司即将迎来第二季度财报最繁忙的一周，投资者将在这一关键时期衡量中国新兴的流动性驱动的涨势是否得到基本面的支撑。【原文：Asian companies are heading into what is expected to be the busiest week of second quarter earnings reports, a crucial period for investors to gauge whether China’s emerging liquidity-driven rally is underpinned by fundamentals.】

item.title: 古兹曼和戈麦斯公司业务放缓，前交易员的卷饼财富暴跌
item.description: 卷饼大亨史蒂文-马克斯（Steven Marks）的蜜月期正式结束：古兹曼-戈麦斯有限公司（Guzman y Gomez Ltd.）在市场上的一鸣惊人让他成为千万富翁，但仅仅一年后，这位创始人的财富就受到了重创。【原文：The honeymoon is officially over for burrito baron Steven Marks: Just a year after Guzman y Gomez Ltd.’s blockbuster market debut made him a multimillionaire, the founder’s fortune is getting hammered.】

item.title: 在市场炒作和全球雄心下，中国国防盈利面临现实考验
item.description: 中国国防股今年的涨势有可能失去动力，因为该行业的早期收益看起来乏善可陈，这让人们对下月举行的大规模 "胜利日 "阅兵活动的热情大打折扣。【原文：This year’s rally in China’s defense stocks risks losing steam as early earnings for the sector look lackluster, deflating excitement that’s building over next month’s massive “Victory Day” parade.】

item.title: 越南亿万富翁的出租车公司在东南亚迎战 Grab
item.description: 越南首富范发旺（Pham Nhat Vuong）希望颠覆整个东南亚的叫车行业，因为他的出租车公司 Green & Smart Mobility JSC（简称 GSM）将与 Grab Holdings Ltd.（简称 Grab）一较高下，成为其本土市场的头号叫车运营商。【原文：Vietnam’s richest man Pham Nhat Vuong is looking to disrupt ride-hailing sectors across Southeast Asia as his taxi company Green & Smart Mobility JSC, or GSM, battles Grab Holdings Ltd. to be the top ride operator in his home market.】

item.title: 皮尔巴拉矿业公司四年来首次出现财政年度亏损
item.description: 由于锂价格下滑，皮尔巴拉矿业有限公司（Pilbara Minerals Ltd. ）四年来首次出现亏损。【原文：Pilbara Minerals Ltd. posted its first loss in four years as slumping lithium prices bite.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将在鲍威尔中枢调整后上扬：市场综述
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔为下月恢复降息敞开大门之后，亚洲股市周一将追随华尔街走高。【原文：Equities in Asia were set to track Wall Street higher Monday after Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell opened the door to a resumption of rate cuts next month.】

item.title: 新西兰央行审查建议大幅降低银行资本缓冲
item.description: 新西兰央行就贷款人资本要求审查展开了咨询，强调了总体资本比率的两种选择，与 2019 年的决定相比，这两种选择都大幅降低了要求。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank has opened consultation on a review of capital requirements for lenders, highlighting two options for overall capital ratios which both materially reduce requirements compared with 2019 decisions.】

item.title: 美国股市反弹提振情绪，日本股市将上涨
item.description: 由于美国股市大涨提振了市场情绪，超过了对日元走强的担忧，日本股市周一有望上涨。【原文：Japanese stocks are poised to gain on Monday as a surge in US equities bolsters sentiment, outweighing concerns over a stronger yen.】

item.title: 分析师认为亚洲股市和货币受鸽派鲍威尔支持
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔研讨会上的讲话表明，美联储最快将在 9 月份的下一次政策会议上降息。【原文：Asian equities are set for a strong start and currencies are likely to gain after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s speech at the Jackson Hole symposium signaled the Fed is headed for an interest-rate cut as soon as its next policy meeting in September.】

item.title: TPG 最新基金加入亚洲中型收购热潮
item.description: TPG Inc. 是大型另类资产管理公司之一，目前正在亚洲寻求资金支持中型投资项目，一改其专注于大型交易的传统。【原文：TPG Inc. is among large alternative asset managers now seeking money to back mid-sized investments in Asia, a move away from its traditional focus on bigger deals.】

item.title: AFR 称，桑托斯将宣布延长 Adnoc 的独家经营权
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道，桑托斯有限公司（Santos Ltd.）预计将宣布延长由阿布扎比牵头的集团拟以 187 亿美元收购该公司的排他性期限。【原文：Santos Ltd. is expected to announce an extension in the exclusivity period for its proposed $18.7 billion takeover by an Abu Dhabi-led group, the Australian Financial Review said.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称 Keurig Dr Pepper 接近 180 亿美元收购 JDE Peet's
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，Keurig Dr Pepper 接近达成以大约 180 亿美元的价格收购欧洲咖啡公司 JDE Peet's 的交易。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper is close to a deal to acquire European coffee company JDE Peet’s for roughly $18 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰总理卢克松同意那些希望新西兰央行大幅减息的人的意见
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克森（Christopher Luxon）表示，他个人同意储备银行上周应将官方现金利率下调 50 个基点。【原文：New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said he personally agrees the Reserve Bank should have cut the Official Cash Rate by 50 basis points last week.】

item.title: 澳大利亚股市炙手可热，对盈利不佳者毫不留情
item.description: 澳大利亚股市不断刷新纪录，但对任何失误都毫不留情。【原文：Australia’s stock market keeps breaking record after record — but is proving ruthless toward any missteps.】

item.title: 大规模杀伤性武器是如何受到 ESG 投资者青睐的？
item.description:
欧洲后院战火纷飞，欧洲领导人不希望任何环境、社会和公司治理方面的顾虑妨碍他们引导私人资本投入足以抵御俄罗斯的军事威慑力量。【原文：

With war raging in its backyard, Europe’s leaders don’t want any ESG qualms to get in the way of steering private capital into a military deterrent strong enough to resist Russia.

】
